name: Droppy Ball
description:
Droppy Ball

Droppy ball is a game made for Trijam #133 in a total of 03 hours, 15 minutes and 23 seconds.

The purpose of the game is to balance a ball through and ever scrolling level. Try to score as high as possible! 

Movement of the platform is done by the mouse and the platform can be rotated using A + D Keys or the Arrow Keys.

Because of some bugs I had to fix it was sadly not possible for me to stay under the 3 hours, so that will be a target for the next Trijam!
